evidence.claim: Flournoy Health Systems adheres to HIPAA standards for patient data protection.
The organization utilizes FHIR for health data interoperability.
Flournoy is involved in electronic data interchange using X12 transaction sets.
HL7 standards are incorporated into their data sharing processes.

icp.icp_reason: Flournoy integrates X12 standards for health data exchange, aligning with our ICP focus.
